name: Target URL
description: URL scanned

name: Target URL - Base Domain
description: Base Domain of Target URL

name: Target URL - Top Level Domain
description: Top level domain of Target URL

name: Final URL
description: Final URL after redirects [301, 302, etc.]

name: Final URL - Base Domain
description: Base Domain of Final URL (after redirects)

name: Final URL - Base Website
description: Base Website of Final URL (after redirects)

name: Final URL - Top Level Domain
description: Top level domain of Final URL

name: Final URL - MIMEtype
description: MIMEtype of Final URL

name: Final URL - Live
description: Does the Final URL return a 2** response?

name: Target URL - Redirects
description: Does the Target URL redirect?

name: Final URL - Same Base Domain As Target URL
description: Is the Final URL in same base domain as the Target URL (e.g. www.18f.gov redirects to 18f.gsa.gov = different base domain)?

name: Final URL - Same Base Website As Target URL
description: Is the Final URL has the same base website as the Target URL (e.g. www.gsaauctions.gov redirects to www.gsaauctions.gov/somepage = same base website)?

name: Target URL - Base Domain Agency Owner
description: Agency Owner of Target URL Base Domain

name: Target URL - Base Domain Bureau Owner
description: Bureau Owner of Target URL Base Domain

name: Target URL - Base Domain Branch
description: Branch of Government of the Agency Owner of Target URL Base Domain

name: Final URL - Status Code
description: Server status code of the Final URL

name: Target URL - 404 Test
description: Does the Target URL return 404s correctly (TRUE), or give a misleading 200 code (FALSE)?

name: Scan Status - Date
description: Scan date/time (when data is written)

name: Scan Status - Primary
description: Status of the scan of the Final URL [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]
queryable: yes, exact (from a set of specified values)

name: Scan Status - Not Found
description: Status of the 404 Test scan [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Robots.txt
description: Status of the scan for `robots.txt` Final URL [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - Sitemap.xml
description: Status of the scan for `robots.txt` Final URL [Completed, Timeout, DNS resolution error, Invalid SSL cert, Connection refused, Connection reset, Unknown error]

name: Scan Status - DNS
description: Status of the scan of the DNS of the Target URL

name: Target URL - Data Source
description: Which source datasets included this Target URL

name: DNS - IPv6
description: Presence of a DNS AAAA record

name: DNS - Hostname
description: Domain of underlying system, which often suggests use of a cloud or CDN provider

name: Infrastructure - CMS Provider
description: Content management system (currently Adobe, DNN, Drupal, Joomla, Sharepoint, Percussion, Silverstripe, Wordpress)

name: Infrastructure - Cloud.gov Pages Detected
description: Is the Final URL hosted using Cloud.gov Pages?

name: Infrastructure - Login Provider
description: Name of detected login service

name: Infrastructure - Login Detected
description: List of login indicators detected at the Final URL

name: Infrastructure - Search.gov Detected
description: Is the use of Search.gov detected at the Final URL?

name: Infrastructure - Site Search Detected
description: Is a site search functionality detected?

name: Infrastructure - DAP Detected
description: Is DAP detected at the final URL?

name: Infrastructure - DAP Parameters
description: List of DAP parameters detected at the Final URL

name: Infrastructure - Third Party Service Domains
description: List of novel third party domains detected

name: Infrastructure - Third Party Service Count
description: Count of novel third party domains detected

name: Infrastructure - Cookies
description: List of domains associated with each cookie sent by a server

name: Mobile - Viewport Meta Tag
description: Is there a viewport meta tag in the <head>; does it contain a content attribute; does the content attribute's value contain the text 'width='

name: Required Links - URL
description: Presence of certain character strings in the URL of a hyperlink, suggesting a required link (per digital.gov/resources/required-web-content-and-links)

name: Required Links - Text
description: Presence of certain character strings in any hyperlinked text, suggesting a required link (per digital.gov/resources/required-web-content-and-links)

name: Robots.txt - Final URL
description: `Robots.txt` Final URL after redirects (301, 302, etc.)

name: Robots.txt - Detected
description: Is the `robots.txt` Final URL live and does it end with `robots.txt`?

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Live
description: Does the `robots.txt` Final URL return a 2** response?

name: Robots.txt - Target URL - Redirects
description: Does the `robots.txt` Target URL Redirect?

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Status Code
description: Server status code of the `robots.txt` Final URL

name: Robots.txt - MIMEtype
description: MIMEtype of the `robots.txt` Final URL

name: Robots.txt - Final URL - Filesize
description: Filesize of the Final URL of the `robots.txt` (bytes)

name: Robots.txt - Crawl Delay
description: `Robots.txt` specified crawl delay (seconds)

name: Robots.txt - Sitemap Locations
description: List of additional sitemap locations (URLs) found in the robots.txt (limited to 2,000 characters)

name: SEO - article:published_time
description: Open Graph article published time

name: SEO - article:modified_time
description: Open Graph article modified time

name: SEO - Canonical Link
description: Canonical URL HTML element

name: SEO - og:title
description: Open Graph page title

name: SEO - og:description
description: Open Graph description

name: SEO - Main Element
description: Presence of `<main>` element

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL
description: `Sitemap.xml` Final URL after redirects (301, 302, etc.)

name: Sitemap.xml - Detected
description: Is the `sitemap.xml` Final URL live and does it end with `sitemap.xml`?

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Live
description: Does the `sitemap.xml` Final URL return a 2** response?

name: Sitemap.xml - Target URL - Redirects
description: Does the `sitemap.xml` Target URL redirect?

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Status Code
description: Server status code of the `sitemap.xml` Final URL

name: Sitemap.xml - MIMEtype
description: MIMEtype of the `sitemap.xml` Final URL

name: Sitemap.xml - Final URL - Filesize
description: Filesize of the Final URL of the `sitemap.xml` (bytes)

name: Sitemap.xml - Items Count
description: Count of URLs in `sitemap.xml`

name: Sitemap.xml - PDF Count
description: Count of URLs in `sitemap.xml` with `.pdf` extension

name: USWDS - Favicon
description: Presence of USWDS favicon file in markup

name: USWDS - Favicon in CSS
description: Presence of USWDS favicon file in CSS

name: USWDS - Public Sans Font
description: Presence of Public Sans font files in CSS

name: USWDS - Count
description: Calculated likelihood a site is using USWDS. Derived by adding the detected USWDS components together, the higher the number the more USWDS-y it is.

name: USWDS - USA Classes
description: Presence of known USWDS classes in CSS

name: USWDS - Inline CSS
description: Presence of `.usa-` class in in-line CSS

name: USWDS - String
description: Presence of string `uswds` anywhere in HTML

name: USWDS - String in CSS
description: Presence of string `uswds` in CSS

name: USWDS - Semantic Version
description: USWDS semantic version

name: USWDS - Version
description: Presence of version of USWDS, if available
